title: Accessibility problems
description: When launching the Help view, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. The tab key does not perform any actions.
OB: When launching the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key does not perform any actions unless I click on one of the 'live' areas.
SR: When launching the Help view on Windows 2000, the tab key does not perform any actions.
